sources.title: Dégustation Maison
sources.description: Directed by Jacques Tati's daughter Sophie Tatischeff, Dégustation maison (House Tasting) is a thirteen-minute comic short shot in a café in Sainte-Sévère-sur-indre, the same town where Tati's Jour de fête was filmed. It won the César Award For best short fiction film in 1978.

metadata.Plot: Directed by Jacques Tati's daughter Sophie Tatischeff, Dégustation maison is a thirteen-minute comic short shot in a café in Sainte-Sévère-sur-indre, the same town where Tati's Jour de fête was filmed. It won the César Award For best short fiction film in 1978.
